pkdnn.inp_process.database module

class pkdnn.inp_process.database.database_maker(inp_adm: input_admin, reader: raw_reader, mesh_dim: List[int], source: List[float], p0: float)[source]

Bases: object

Read a raw MCNP file to extract input/output informations. The aim of this class is to create binary database file.

read(filename: str, inputs: List[str], output: str, n_samples: int | None = None, max_error: float | None = None)[source]

Reads a raw MCNP file (named ‘filename’) and extract the list of desidered inputs and the desired output. After the reading process, two variables named ‘database_input’ and ‘database_output’ are exctracted.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – name of the raw MCNP file

  • inputs (list[str]) – list of the desired inputs for the database

  • output (str) – desired output for the database

  • n_samples (int, optional) – a number of n_samples is exctracted; n_samples should be lower than the total

  • None. (spanning from 0 to 1. Defaults to) –

  • max_error (float, optional) – the MCNP values with error>max_error are not considered. Error is given as relative error,

  • None. –

save_to_binary(save_path: str)[source]

Save the variables ‘database_output’ and ‘database_input’ to save_path. The variables are saved with this order: output, inputs[0], inputs[1] …

Parameters:

save_path (str) – absolute path were to save the database input/output info

class pkdnn.inp_process.database.input_admin(plane_normal: array, ro: float, mass_fraction: List[float] | None = None, atomic_number: List[int] | None = None, path_to_dose_conversion: str = '', path_to_mass_att_coeff: str = '', energy: float | None = None, plane_coords: List[float] | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

This class permits to calculate relevant values for the standard radiation configuration: point radiaiton source || wall || tallies.

calculate_dose_direct_contribution(source: List[float], tally: List[float]) → float[source]

Calulate the direct contribution to the dose at the tally

Parameters:

  • source (list[float]) – source position

  • tally (list[float]) – tally position

Returns:

dose direct contribution

Return type:

float

define_energy(energy: float)[source]

Instantiate energy and energy related coeffs. In particular it defines: 1. energy [MeV], 2. Mass attenuation coefficiente, 3. Dose conversion factor

Parameters:

energy (float) – _description_

define_wall_coords(plane_coord: List[float])[source]

Instantiates the coordinates of the planes that defines the wall

Parameters:

plane_coord (list[float]) – the two plane values (default on Y-axis)
